channel.title: MESG Product Update - February '20
channel.description:
We’ve been quite busy over the past few months shipping the testnet and updating to ATD v2. Additionally, we received an Aragon Nest grant and shipped our first milestone for the integration.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/p/bcba904a-a055-4e91-919d-3687c706ba5c/
